# Portfolio Project Instructions

This is a modern personal portfolio website for Cüneyt Çakar featuring:
- macOS-inspired design system with glassmorphism effects
- Liquid/fluid animations and micro-interactions
- Modern design systems (Material Design 3, Apple Human Interface Guidelines)
- Responsive layout with CSS Grid and Flexbox
- Projects showcase with interactive cards
- GitHub profile integration
- Performance-optimized animations and transitions

## Design System Guidelines
- Use modern design tokens and CSS custom properties
- Implement design system components with consistent spacing, typography, and colors
- Follow accessibility best practices (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Progressive enhancement approach
